Class HallService

java.lang.Object
com.javaoop.movie_booking_app.service.HallService
@Service public class HallService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing halls and their seats. Provides operations to retrieve halls and create halls with corresponding seats.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    HallService(HallRepository hallRepository, SeatRepository seatRepository)
    Constructs the HallService with the required repositories.

  • Constructor Details

    • HallService

      @Autowired public HallService(HallRepository hallRepository, SeatRepository seatRepository)
      Constructs the HallService with the required repositories.
      Parameters:
      hallRepository - the repository for hall entities
      seatRepository - the repository for seat entities

  • Method Details

    • getAllHalls

      public List<Hall> getAllHalls()
      Retrieves a list of all halls.
      Returns:
      a list containing all Hall entities

    • getHallById

      public Optional<Hall> getHallById(Long id)
      Finds a hall by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the hall to find
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the Hall if found, otherwise empty

    • createHall

      public void createHall(Hall hall)
      Creates a new hall and initializes its seats according to the hall type. For each row and seat number in the hall configuration, creates and saves a Seat entity. The hall entity is saved first to ensure seats are associated correctly.
      Parameters:
      hall - the Hall entity to create
